summary: Tested ActionModals refactoring and file upload feature. All 3 extracted modal components (AddTaskModal, AddAssetDebtModal, AddContactModal) work correctly from sidebar Actions menu. File upload section in AssetDebtModal edit mode is functional with upload area, file input, and existing attachments display.
passed_tests: Login with staff credentials (brittany@illinoisestatelaw.com) - PASS
Dashboard loads with sidebar Actions menu visible - PASS
Add Task modal opens from sidebar - PASS
Add Task modal shows all fields: Task input, Status dropdown (default: Not Started), Priority dropdown (default: Normal), Due Date, Assigned To, Link to Matter search, Notes textarea - PASS
Add Task modal Cancel and Add Task buttons work - PASS
Add Asset/Debt modal opens from sidebar - PASS
Add Asset/Debt modal shows all fields: Name, Asset or Debt dropdown, Type of Asset/Debt (conditional), Value, Status, Link to Matter search, Notes - PASS
Add Asset/Debt modal Asset/Debt dropdown shows Type of Asset when Asset selected - PASS
Add Asset/Debt modal Cancel and Add Asset/Debt buttons work - PASS
Add Case Contact modal opens from sidebar - PASS
Add Case Contact modal shows all fields: Name, Type dropdown, Street Address, City, State, Zip Code, Link to Matter search, Disabled/Minor checkbox - PASS
Add Case Contact modal shows Relationship to Decedent field when Heir type selected - PASS
Add Case Contact modal Cancel and Add Contact buttons work - PASS
Navigate to Assets & Debts page via More menu - PASS
Assets & Debts page shows 806 records (462 Assets, 78 Debts) - PASS
Click asset/debt item opens detail modal - PASS
Asset/Debt detail modal shows: Name, Type badge, Status badge, Value, Type of Asset/Debt, Matter, Notes, Attachments with view/download buttons - PASS
Edit button opens edit mode - PASS
Edit mode shows Attachments section with existing files - PASS
Edit mode shows 'Click to upload files' upload area - PASS
Edit mode shows 'PDF, Images, Documents' supported file types text - PASS
Edit mode has file input element for uploads - PASS
Cancel button closes edit modal - PASS
Save Changes button present in edit mode - PASS
context_for_next_testing_agent: ActionModals refactoring complete - AddTaskModal, AddAssetDebtModal, and AddContactModal extracted to /components/modals/ directory. All modals open correctly from sidebar Actions menu. File upload feature added to AssetDebtModal edit mode - shows existing attachments with view/download, upload area with 'Click to upload files' text, and supports PDF, Images, Documents. Backend endpoint POST /api/airtable/assets-debts/{record_id}/attachments handles file uploads with base64 encoding.
